title: Black Homepage
body: Well, after I finished updating the patch, my homescreen was normal, but after I play a round of the ARAM, my homepage turns completely blank...help pls....

replies.body:
Hey Rload,
Try running **CCleaner** - this will remove any temporary files, clean up junk on your PC and fix your registry.
You can download it for free from _**[Piriform](https://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/download)**_.

Let me know if this works.

Sorry for the late reply, I didn't receive any notifications about your response.

Have you had any luck since?
If not, I'd suggest simply uninstalling and reinstalling the client.
